description: Manage Linode Support Tickets. See also: linode-cli. More information: https://techdocs.akamai.com/cloud-computing/docs/cli-commands-for-account-management.

useCases.syntax: linode-cli tickets create --summary "{{Summary or quick title for the Ticket}}" --description "{{Detailed description of the issue}}"
linode-cli tickets reply {{ticket_id}} --description "{{The content of your reply}}"
